content: *originally designed during the my blanket along in march 2015 this project that i only worked on during weekends is now released as a simple but colourful pattern * **pattern notes** this pattern is for a lap or smaller bed blanket and is constructed in a modular style with joins made through the corners of each hexagon for more information about this blanket please see the link below **skill level** *easy/improver* basic stitches are used experience with join as you go technique would be helpful **yarn** i used dk yarn but you could use any weight of yarn that you wish to make for more details on the yarn and colours i used please see the link below **needles/hook** hook 4mm g usa or recommended hook for the yarn you are using **materials** yarn needle **size** size 158 x 130cm 62 x 51 or dependant on yarn used **gauge** n/a **free version includes ** * a full written pattern with clear instructions * stitch abbreviations * see link below **paid pattern includes ** * layout diagram with colour breakdown * crochet charts of each motif and the border * us translation **pattern written in ** uk terms **translations ** dutch version 1 kindly provided by iris van meer **cherry heart s cozy corner** please come and join the cherry heart group 2 watch podcasts join crochet/knit alongs share your projects and enjoy yarny chit chat **love to share ** #cherryheart 1 http //eenmooigebaar nl/weekender-deken-cherry-heart/ 2 http //www ravelry com/groups/cherry-hearts-cozy-corner
